logout.title: Logout from account
logout.text: Are you sure you want to logout? Make sure you're saved your password, because there is no way to restore it.

form_errors.latin_only: Only a-z and A-Z characters, digits and underscore are allowed
form_errors.username_too_long: Username cannot be longer than 16 characters
form_errors.displayName_too_long: Displayed name cannot be longer than 36 characters
form_errors.password_too_long: Password cannot be longer than 128 characters
form_errors.username_conflict: User with this username already exist
